title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Explore nearly a dozen ready-made lessons with downloadable worksheets and answer keys. All Curriculum Materials     Traveling Trunks Lighter than a wooden trunk, smaller than a breadbasket...almost...it's the "Traveling Haversack!" Six separate small-group discovery activities +  primary source materials + copies of artifacts = lots of hands-on learning opportunities for students. All Traveling Trunks     Guest Speakers Can't bring your class to the park?  Learn how you can invite a park ranger to visit your class! All Guest Speakers
